question.body: Let p be the proportion of contaminated drinking water in airplanes. Write down the appropriate null and alternative hypotheses.

explanation.p: As usual, H0 claims that "nothing special is going on" with the drinking water in airplanes—the contamination rate is the same as the contamination rate in drinking water in general. Ha represents what we suspect, or what we want to check. In this case, we want to check whether drinking water on airplanes is more contaminated than drinking water in general.
